sentences.en: A storm grounded the ship on a sandbar.
sentences.cn: 一场风暴使船搁浅在沙洲上.

sentences.en: Blame, but also can blame myself as cold branches would pick, ultimately , lonely sandbar cold habitat.
sentences.cn: 怨哉, 却也只能怪我自己拣尽寒枝不肯栖, 终究寂寞沙洲冷.

sentences.en: Low water bares gray strips of sandbar on which the natives build tiny palm-thatch shelters for overnight fishing trips.
sentences.cn: 水浅的地方露出灰茫茫的狭长沙洲，土著人在沙洲上为过夜的渔夫搭建了小小的棕榈茅舍。

sentences.en: The group also reported the dusky and sandbar sharks as being threatened.
sentences.cn: 该组织还报告了灰鲨和沙洲鲨也正受到威胁。

sentences.en: The ship was hung up on a sandbar three hours.
sentences.cn: 那艘轮船在沙洲搁浅了3个小时.

sentences.en: The ship was hung up on a sandbar.
What took my breath away was the almost one kilometer-long sandbar that stretched away from the island itself.
sentences.cn: 让我感到美得几乎窒息的是那长达近一千米的沙洲，自岛身延展出去。

sentences.en: Without the fungi, this would be just another sandbar.
sentences.cn: 如果没有真菌，这里将成为另一个沙洲。

trans.tran_en: A sandbar is a sandbank which is found especially at the mouth of a river or harbour
